data.description:
At 14th level, you have an incredible breadth of magical understanding. When you see a creature cast a spell of a level equal to or lower than your Intelligence modifier, you automatically know what spell it is.

In addition, choose one Flux effect. The chosen effect doesnâ€™t interfere with your normal use of Flux and can be used an unlimited number of times. When you gain a level in this class, you can replace it with a different Flux effect.
